title: 10-hour water cut in Colombo today
body_lines: A 10-hour water cut will be in place in several areas in Colombo today, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) said.
They said the watercut will impose from today at 10.00 pm to 8.00 am on Sunday (22) due to essential distribution network improvement work.
As such, water supply to Colombo 12, 13, 14 and 15 will be interrupted while water supply will be at low pressure in Colombo 1 and 11, they said.
The NWSDB advises consumers to fill sufficient water ahead and expresses regret for the inconvenience caused.
It also requests people to use water cautiotiously. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
